"I'm not the type to hold back my punches because

quickly turned away.

EV001: EV025
EV026

『入り口でも注意喚起があったと思うんだけど、
　ここの敵って異様に強いのよね。
　1戦1戦、なかなか骨が折れるわ。』
column2:
"The person at the forest entrance mentioned it too,
 but the monsters around here are abnormally strong.
 I need to use my full focus in every battle to win."

EV001:
『……え？
　一度倒したら敵の動きが見えるようになるんじゃないか？
　貴方、一体何を言ってるのかしら。』
column2:
"...Eh? Don't the monster's movements become
 easier to understand after defeating it once? 
 ...What on earth are you saying?"

EV001:
『……もしかして、そういうスキルがあるの？
　あるのだとしたら羨ましいことこの上ないわね。
　レベル上げし放題じゃない。』
column2:
"...Do you perhaps have a skill that makes something
 like that happen? If that's true, then I can't be
 more envious of you. Leveling would be such a breeze
 with a skill like that."

EV001:
<アル>
『んー？
　1度倒した敵はすんなり倒せてるよね？
　それって、みんながそうってわけじゃないんだね！』
column2:
<Al>
"Hmm? \n[1], you can defeat the monsters
 you've defeated once without any trouble, right?
 It looks like that's not the same for everyone."

EV001: EV027

『ちょっと、私は敵じゃないからね！
　……え？分かってる？それならいいのよ。』
column2:
"W-Wait! I'm not an enemy! ...Eh? You realized that?
 Phew... I'm glad that you did."

EV001:
『ここの敵と私の格好、
　結構似てるからたまに間違えられるのよね。
　危ないったらありゃしない。』
column2:
"I look similar to the monsters of this area with
 my equipment, so sometimes I get mistaken for one.
 I need to pay attention to both players and monsters 
 because of that."

EV001:
<アル>
『それなら服装を変えちゃえば……
　とは気楽に言えないよね。
　今の装備が一番強いんだろうし。』
column2:
<Al>
"Couldn't she just change her clothes? 
 ...But if that's her strongest equipment,
 I guess she wouldn't want to."

column2:

"...Hey, \n[1]. If you found a powerful
 piece of equipment that looked really bizarre,
 would you still wear it?"

EV001: 使う
column2: Yes
